languages.text: "Разумеется. Вероятнее всего, ей это покладистое приглашение на царствование и является". {n}Маражай пристально смотрит в глаза Караэлю. Тот не отводит взгляд.{/n}
"But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Вероятнее всего, ей это покладистое приглашение на царствование и является". {n}Маражай пристально смотрит в глаза Караэлю. Тот не отводит взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But of course. What else can such a gracious invitation to reign be." {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. The doesn't look away.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Aber natürlich. Was sonst könnte eine solch freundliche Einladung zu herrschen sein?" {n}Marazhai starrt Kharael intensiv in die Augen. Er wendet den Blick nicht ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich. Was sonst könnte eine solch freundliche Einladung zu herrschen sein?" {n}Marazhai starrt Kharael intensiv in die Augen. Er wendet den Blick nicht ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “当然了，否则还能是什么亲切的邀请吗？”{n}玛拉斋目不转睛地盯着卡瑞尔的眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然了，否则还能是什么亲切的邀请吗？”{n}玛拉斋目不转睛地盯着卡瑞尔的眼睛。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Évidemment. Qu'y aurait-il d'autre derrière une aussi gracieuse invitation au pouvoir ? » {n}Marazhai fixe attentivement Kharael dans les yeux. Il ne détourne pas le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment. Qu'y aurait-il d'autre derrière une aussi gracieuse invitation au pouvoir ? » {n}Marazhai fixe attentivement Kharael dans les yeux. Il ne détourne pas le regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Por supuesto. ¿Qué otra cosa iba a ser una invitación tan amable a gobernar?». {n}Marazhai mira fijamente a Kharael, que no aparta la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. ¿Qué otra cosa iba a ser una invitación tan amable a gobernar?». {n}Marazhai mira fijamente a Kharael, que no aparta la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろんだ。素晴らしい招待以外の何だっていうんだ？」{n}マラズハイは意図的にカラエルの目を覗き込む。彼は目をそらさない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ。素晴らしい招待以外の何だっていうんだ？」{n}マラズハイは意図的にカラエルの目を覗き込む。彼は目をそらさない。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Elbette öyle. Önderlik etmem için böylesi cömert bir davet almamın başka ne sebebi olacak?" {n}Marazhai, Kharael'in gözlerine dikkatle bakıyor. Kharael gözlerini kaçırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But of course. What else could such a gracious invitation to rule be?" {n}Marazhai stares into Kharael's eyes intently. He does not look away.{/n}
